item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr

@itzkyle wrote:

put this in public boolean process

if(playerRights >= 2){if(IsDead) IsDead = false;NewHP = playerLevel[3];}

Changeplaye rights to what ever you wish

}

item.title: Noob question But how do I make it so admins don't die?
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“rs w00dcut, post:12, topic:140944”][quote author=Sin_ link=topic=193164.msg1736542#msg1736542 date=1189144375]

[quote author=rs w00dcut link=topic=193164.msg1736533#msg1736533 date=1189144314]

simply make a command that give em infinite hp, or give them p ring item id 773 they rarely die with that
[/quote]Lulz…retard pl0x.

I am surprised you can even make commands, “lulz…retard pl0x.”.
[/quote]Commands? I got 1 for u.
If command stats with ::fuckoff nub
FUCK OFF and l2 spell[/quote]

Well, since you just had about 6 spelling mistakes in that sentence, then you tell somebody to learn to spell.

Commands? I got one for you..
If command starts with ::fuckoff newbie.
FUCK OFF and learn to spell.

Read full topic
